snippet: UEFA charged the Russian soccer association on Saturday after fans were filmed fighting with stadium stewards after a European Championship match.
abstract: UEFA charges the Russian soccer association with ' improper conduct' after fans were filmed fighting with stadium stewards after a European Championship match against Czech Republic.
lead_paragraph: UEFA charged the Russian soccer association on Saturday after fans were filmed fighting with stadium stewards after a European Championship match.

headline.seo: UEFA Charges Russia Over Fan Violence at Euro 2012
headline.main: UEFA Charges Russia Over Fan Violence at Euro 2012
headline.print_headline: UEFA Criticizes Russian Fans After Fight
